plays.text: Penalty to Clarke Wilm 2 minutes for Interference Mike York

Penalty to Steve Staios 2 minutes for Roughing Clarke Wilm

Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Roughing Ales Hemsky
Penalty to Alexei Semenov 2 minutes for Holding Scott Walker
Penalty to Scott Walker 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Steve Staios
Goal scored by Cory Cross assisted by Radek Dvorak and Mike York
